title: Bucks Take Series Lead Without Giannis, Suns To The Finals, No Asterisks Needed
description:
Brian Windhorst, Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps discuss the Bucks absolutely dominating the Hawks in the paint, the great game from Brook Lopez, the various injury situations of the series, the Suns’ amazing run to the NBA Finals and how there should be no asterisk stories for the playoffs.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, NBA, Brian Windhorst
itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Bucks Dominate The Hawks In The Paint, The Suns Advance To The Finals
